Text.Line: Zorg: "It’s pointless, human. I’m going to make all humans disappear in their sleep."
Zorg: "Humanity causes more harm than good: you use each other, destroy the world, and leave little room for each other."
Player: "That’s not true, and I can prove it."
Zorg: "Alright, if you're sure, I’ll teleport us to three places where humanity shows its worst."

DialogueOptions.AnswerText: Uh, never mind. I’d rather continue my walk.

Text.Line: Zorg teleports you to the next location.
Zorg decides to make humanity disappear.
